name: Rhythm Knights: Double Treble
description:
A day after the original game's events, King Bearton is BACK with his new plan to take the Rhythm Knights out once and for all.



The first game was not so hot... so this time, we brought the heat! The Rhythm Knights are back with all-new features! Rhythm Knights: Double Treble is a 2-4 key story-based rhythm game containing over 20 Levels! 7 of which are from Rhythm Knights: Reharmonized, the remastered release of the first classic which is included for free!



When the trouble is double, you know who to call.

CREDITS:
Dallen Larson - Director & Programmer
ZachJaDa - Artist
Noobstack - Music
Umbre - Guest Artist for Extra Pixels Level
Dominic/Chasmic - Co-Director & Voice Actor
Boatman - Steam Page Contributor
